text: This is a list of Kosovan football transfers for the summer sale prior to the 2018–19 season. Only moves from Football Superleague of Kosovo are listed. ==Transfers== ===Ballkani=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Drenica=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Drita=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Ferizaj=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Feronikeli=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Flamurtari=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Gjilani=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===KEK=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Liria=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Llapi=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Prishtina=== ====In==== ====Out==== ===Trepça'89=== ====In==== ====Out==== ==References== Kosovo Category:Lists of Kosovan football transfers
title: List of Kosovan football transfers summer 2018
